definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The solubility increase is not obvious with nonionic surfactants added.
sentences.chinese: 它与非离子表面活性剂复配增溶效果不明显。

sentences.english: The new system is made of single amphoteric surfactant and clay stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 该体系由单一两性表面活性剂和黏土稳定剂组成。

sentences.english: On the contrary, for the anionic surfactant an opposite effect was observed.
sentences.chinese: 相反，对阴离子活性剂观察到相反的效应。

sentences.english: Lurgiuses has used undisclosed promoter and corrosion inhibitor .
sentences.chinese: 鲁奈公司采用了未公开的活性剂和防蚀剂。

sentences.english: The adding of surfactant in emulsion improved the encapsulation of protein in PLAPEG microspheres.
sentences.chinese: 适当加入表面活性剂可改善微球对蛋白的包接性能。

sentences.english: The effects of surfactant (SDS) concentrations were also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 观察了表面活性剂SDS浓度的影响。

sentences.english: Objective introduce the development of Non-ionic surfactant based vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍非离子表面活性剂囊泡的研究进展。

sentences.english: At the present time there is an increasing interest in the use of biosurfactants.
sentences.chinese: 现在人们对生物表面活性剂越来越感兴趣。

sentences.english: To develop affordable surfactants and oil displacement systems is the key.
sentences.chinese: 研制出经济实惠的表面活性剂和驱油体系是关键。

sentences.english: The results showed that the resistance factor of FPJ surfactant achieved 17.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，表面活性剂FPJ的阻力因子达到17。

sentences.english: Multifunctiona synergist MAT is a king of anionic surfactant.
sentences.chinese: 多功能增效剂MAT属阴离子表面活性剂。

sentences.english: The research of borate ester surfactants is still in the initial stage.
sentences.chinese: 硼酸酯表面活性剂在国内外的研究都还处于起始阶段。

sentences.english: The micelles'solubilizing technology was one of the important effects of surfactants.
sentences.chinese: 胶束增溶技术是表面活性剂的一个重要作用。

sentences.english: The outlook of development in applications of biosurfactants was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 最后展望了生物表面活性剂的应用前景。

sentences.english: The graft hydrophilic polymer could effectively prevent surfactant from adsorbing on the surface of micelles.
sentences.chinese: 微胶束在接枝前，被表面活性剂吸附甚至形成包围。

sentences.english: Further control is obtained through the choice of surfactant and its ability to form micelles of various sizes.
sentences.chinese: 选择不同的表面活性剂，会形成不同大小的胶团。
